dcterms:creator: R. S. Sutton
A. G. Barto
dcterms:description: A stochastic version of the Cliffwalk environment where the agent needs to travel from a start state to a goal state while incurring as little cost as possible. Each action incurs a cost, and there are slippery cells that can lead to a cliff.
dcterms:title: Cliffwalk environment
